I've been watching a lot of old gamebook videos and I've got an idea in my head that I might enjoy setting something up similar with health, gold, rations and the like. Only problem I can see is that there won't be a nice way for the player to always be able to see their stats without me copy/pasting it onto every page.

Is there a way to enable a status bar in gamebook mode, sort of like what the text adventure version has?

Posts.EditableText: Since Quest output is HTML/JS based, you can freely create whatever UI components you desire - if you know those languages. Would an easier alternative be to do a "Gamebook-like" in standard mode, where you hide the input bar and output command links, etc, but you'd still have the power of the full mode?
